messages.title: Cheryl's Commitment to Erewash
messages.content: I am proud to stand up for Erewash, where I grew up, and have brought up my children.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cheryl Pidgeon commits to increasing the police presence on streets.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More local jobs for the future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cheryl Pidgeon commits to creating more local jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for the creation of a National Care Service
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cheryl Pidgeon supports the creation of a National Care Service.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for our Schools and NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cheryl Pidgeon commits to supporting schools and the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Labour will work for you and your family every day
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cheryl Pidgeon pledges to work for the community and families every day.

issues.socialWelfare: Support local families; Sure Start Centres, Child Tax Credits, pensioners' benefits.

leaflet.personalStatement: My message to our community is simple: I will always be here for you and I am on your side.

contactInformation.address: East Midlands Labour Party Building, 23 Barratt Lane, Attenborough, Nottingham, NG9 6AD

images.caption: Cheryl Pidgeon YOUR LABOUR CANDIDATE FOR EREWASH
